subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Amid the players' tears, banged-up bodies and the subdued packing of bags, B. Thomas Golisano, the Sabres' owner, realized something that few in the room had: The Sabres have a bright future.
snippet: Amid the players' tears, banged-up bodies and the subdued packing of bags, B. Thomas Golisano, the Sabres' owner, realized something that few in the room had: The Sabres have a bright future.
